title: please help
body: My game is crashing. Thats why i always get a "Leaver Booster". So can you take off the "Leaver Booster" and fix this bug, or tell me how to do something with the crashing.

replies.body: When i crash it says League Of Legends Client has stopped working. And League Of Legends turns off. When i reconnect and finnish the mach, i get a Leaver Booster.

[Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)can only be removed through consistently playing without interruptions.  If you are crashing, I'd like to help but need more information.  What exactly do you mean by crashing, and are you receiving any error messages?  At what point are you seeing this crash happen? Anything could help!
??????????????? really? how many people have you answered are having the exact same issue?
